pages.title: Small Clue
pages.text: Just like Fading, they prefer a specific block placed next to them. This time a lot more strong, though.$(br)'I hate mining this' strong, to be precise.

pages.title: Concise Instruction
pages.text: The preferred food is Obsidian.$(br2)Watch out for their insatiable hunger. They will eat quite a lot, if given the chance...
